item.title: Terraform Staging
item.description: Intro I am going to use a terraform project to deploy resources in three environments, dev, staging and production. There are several alternatives. First one will be using several directories with variables Option 1. Step 1. Create a folder tree Create a folder tree as follows yourproject │ ├── modules │ ├── prod │ └── staging We can create three VPC one per environment. To do dat first we are going to create a moudule for vpc under modules folder.
